abilities.name: Rapid Embarkation
abilities.rule: At the end of the Fight phase, if there are no models currently embarked within this **TRANSPORT**, you can select one friendly **HARLEQUINS INFANTRY** unit that has 6 or fewer models that is wholly within 6" of this **TRANSPORT**. Unless that unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can embark within this **TRANSPORT**.
